discussion_comments.commented_code:
@@ -37,4 +37,7 @@ jobs:
         uses: golangci/golangci-lint-action@v6
         with:
           # NOTE: Keep this in sync with the version from .golangci.yml
-          version: v1.62.2
+          version: v1.64
discussion_comments.comment_body: Should we specify the full version here to match with the Makefile's version of `1.64.7`? This way we can ensure that we can keep local and workflow golangci-lint versions in sync.

commented_code:
with:
           go-version: ${{ matrix.go-version }}
 
-      - run: go test ./... -v -race -count=1
+      - name: Setup gotestsum
+        uses: autero1/action-gotestsum@v2.0.0

discussion_comments.commented_code:
@@ -30,4 +30,9 @@ jobs:
         with:
           go-version: ${{ matrix.go-version }}
 
-      - run: go test ./... -v -race -count=1
+      - name: Setup gotestsum
+        uses: autero1/action-gotestsum@v2.0.0
discussion_comments.comment_body: This action hasn't been updated since early 2023. See this https://github.com/autero1/action-gotestsum/issues/46

discussion_comments.commented_code:
@@ -30,4 +30,9 @@ jobs:
         with:
           go-version: ${{ matrix.go-version }}
 
-      - run: go test ./... -v -race -count=1
+      - name: Setup gotestsum
+        uses: autero1/action-gotestsum@v2.0.0
discussion_comments.comment_body: I think we better of by running `go install gotest.tools/gotestsum@latest`

discussion_comments.commented_code:
@@ -30,4 +30,9 @@ jobs:
         with:
           go-version: ${{ matrix.go-version }}
 
-      - run: go test ./... -v -race -count=1
+      - name: Setup gotestsum
+        uses: autero1/action-gotestsum@v2.0.0
discussion_comments.comment_body:
Yeah we can also do `go run gotest.tools/gotestsum@v1.11.0`, it just might take a little bit to build on the windows & darwin runners.

But the action is really just a fancy `curl -L https://github.com/gotestyourself/gotestsum/releases/download/v${VERSION}/gotestsum_${VERSION}_${GOOS}_${GOARCH}.tar.gz | tar -xz` so I suppose I could do that instead

discussion_comments.commented_code:
@@ -30,4 +30,9 @@ jobs:
         with:
           go-version: ${{ matrix.go-version }}
 
-      - run: go test ./... -v -race -count=1
+      - name: Setup gotestsum
+        uses: autero1/action-gotestsum@v2.0.0
discussion_comments.comment_body: That's too cumbersome, just use `go install`, we already do that for `gosec`and `govulncheck`.

commented_code:
- name: Install Go
         uses: actions/setup-go@v4
         with:
+          cache: false # setup-go v4 caches by default

discussion_comments.commented_code:
@@ -27,9 +27,9 @@ jobs:
       - name: Install Go
         uses: actions/setup-go@v4
         with:
+          cache: false # setup-go v4 caches by default

@@ -27,9 +27,9 @@ jobs:
       - name: Install Go
         uses: actions/setup-go@v4
         with:
+          cache: false # setup-go v4 caches by default
discussion_comments.comment_body: Added so we do not use a cache for any of the `setup-go@v4` actions. See the relevant commit and https://github.com/actions/setup-go/blob/main/action.yml#L15-L17
